task.title: Access PBX via Cellular Network
task.shortdesc: Only when the cellular network has a public IP or host name can you access the PBX via the cellular network.

step.cmd: Get the IP address or host name of your 4G trunk from the carrier, or check the 4G network on the PBX.
Enter the IP address or host name in your web browser, press Enter to access the PBX web interface.
